snippet: Juan Saez, a 17-year-old apprentice jockey, died Tuesday night after sustaining head injuries in a riding accident at the Indiana Grand racetrack. Wednesday’s racing there was canceled.
abstract: Juan Saez, an apprentice jockey, dies after sustaining head injuries in a riding accident at the Indiana Grand racetrack.
lead_paragraph: Juan Saez, a 17-year-old apprentice jockey, died Tuesday night after sustaining head injuries in a riding accident at the Indiana Grand racetrack. Wednesday’s racing there was canceled.
